name: dependently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is influenced or decided by something else: The two joints are dependently linked to each other. The melting process causes a reaction which proceeds dependently on the water temperature.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen an object is dependently valued, its value is based on something other than itself.Microorganisms can exist either independently or dependently upon another organism for life. The mind exists dependently because the existence of thoughts relies on sense data from the external world.
